text:
Telerik Sitefinity | Waltham, MA | On Site | Full Time

Sales Engineer

We are looking for a Sales Engineer to join the Sitefinity team. .NET experience would be ideal, but really any OOP experience will transfer. We are a small SE team in the US, but growing as we move from mid-market to enterprise and selling new products to tackle advanced marketing analytics and machine learning in addition to our core CMS offering.

http://jobs.jobvite.com/careers/progress/job/oHJY0fw8
